property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. {INVASION}-Light command (When one of your Light command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may put a creature from your hand under this creature instead. ■ While there are 3 or more cards under this creature, this creature doesn't leave the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your light creatures that cost 6 or less win all battles. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by a spell effect, they can't choose this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your water creatures in the battle zone. ■ Revolution 2—When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, until the start of your next turn, your opponent's creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your opponent's deck and then put it on the bottom of their deck. If it costs 5 or more, untap this creature after the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your darkness creatures. {INVASION}-Darkness command (When one of your Darkness command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, look at your opponent's hand and discard up to 3 cards from it.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {QUATTRO BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your nature creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures that has less power than this creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets +9000 power and "quattro breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a creature and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then that player shuffles their deck and reveals the top card. If it's a creature, that player may put it in the battle zone for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Then you may put a non-evolution light creature that costs 5 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, one of your creatures in the battle zone gets +3000 power and "blocker" until the start of your next turn.

card.name: La Kulstar, Ball of Heaven Stars

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature, if your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Reveal the top card of your deck and put it on the bottom of your deck. If it was a Light creature, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. ■ After you cast this spell, shuffle it into your deck instead of your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. {INVASION}-Water command (When one of your Water command attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature can't be blocked. ■ When this creature is destroyed, return it from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, you may choose a card that has "shield trigger" from your hand. Use that chosen card for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent reveals the top card of their deck, and puts it on the bottom of their deck. If that card costs 5 or more, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD SAVER} (When one of your shields would be broken, you may destroy this creature instead.) ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, you may choose a creature and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ You may summon darkness evolution creatures from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Reveal the top card of your deck. property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 6000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {POWER ATTACKER} +2000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.) ■ If your opponent has 2 shields or less, each of your fire creatures gets "speed attacker". (A creatures that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Revolution 0 Trigger—Whenever a creature attacks you, if you have no shields, you may cast this spell for no cost. ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck and choose a fire creature from among them.
